title: Heloise and Abelard: The Medieval Scandal
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Heloise and Abelard: The Medieval Scandal.

hook.text: He was her tutor. She was 17. They fell in love, had a secret baby, and the aftermath was brutal beyond imagination.

buildup.text: Peter Abelard was medieval Europe's greatest philosopher. Heloise was his brilliant student in 12th-century Paris.

discovery.text: Their secret affair produced a son. When Heloise's uncle discovered the truth, he had Abelard castrated.

twist.text: Both entered religious orders. But their letters reveal a love that never died â€” among history's most passionate texts.

climax.text: Their love letters survived 900 years. Today they're buried together in Paris. Death united what life could not.

punchline.text: Abelard and Heloise are buried together. Death finished what life couldn't.

quiz.question: What happened to Abelard when the affair was discovered?
options: He was castrated by Heloise's uncle
